casebody.data:
Tony BRUCE, Appellant,
v.
The STATE of Florida, Appellee. No. 3D19-286 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed April 24, 2019. Tony Bruce, in proper person. Ashley Moody, Attorney General, for appellee. Before SALTER, FERNANDEZ and LINDSEY, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
